page.title: 20Brizlincote Valley * Credits
page.content:
Near our school is a small valley through which runs the Brizlincote Brook. At the moment many houses are being built where the fields were. Some of the children at our school live in them. People who live in the area tried to stop the building, but although not so many houses are now going to be built, there are still going to be a lot. People have to live somewhere, but do they have to build houses in one of the most pleasant parts of Burton.
***************************************
This block was surveyed by the children and staff of Edge Hill and Waterside Junior Schools, Stapenhill, Burton upon Trent.
